tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE irrigation_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    area_id INT,
    moisture_reading FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES farm_areas(area_id)
);

CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    area_id INT,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    frequency INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES farm_areas(area_id)
);
